name: Vacuum Trickshots 2
description:
A fun sandbox game with multiplayer and singleplayer. A sandbox game where you play as a legendary vacuum cleaner and his friends - some characters arrive at different times - and just mess around in various maps - more maps to be added later!

Maps currently added that are from other games and have been changed slightly to work in the game:

  • de_dust2 from Counter Strike 1.6
  • Grove Street from Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

Music credits:

Original Soundtrack arranged and produced by JTECH Game Studios.

  • Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - Main Theme Trap Remix.
  • DOOM Eternal Theme - RetroMelon Trap Remix .
  • CSGO Theme - JTECH Game Studios remake.
  • Grand Theft Auto V Welcome to Los Santos - JTECH Game Studios remake.
